name: TIM S.p.A.
bossPosition: Head of Relations with International Institutions
goal:
We develop new generation infrastructures with the goal of ensuring that around 84% of Italian houses have coverage via the new fixed ultra-broadband network and 98% of the population via the new mobile network by the end of 2018. As we believe digital technologies are the basis for a smart, sustainable and inclusive growth. By the end of March 2016, with a total of 11 million km of installed fiber, the fixed network has already reached 45% of the houses and 1,100 municipalities; the mobile network reached 92% of the population and 6,200 municipalities.

KEY FINANCIAL DATA IN IQ 2016
Investments: 944 million euros (5.2 billion in 2015)

Revenues: 4.4 billion euros (19.7 billion in 2015)
EBITDA: 1.7 billion euros (6.1 billion in 2015)
Adjusted net financial debt: 27.1 billion euros (27.3 billion in 2015)

OUR CUSTOMERS IN IQ 2016
TIM in Italy

29.8 million mobile lines
11.6 million mobile BB users
11.6 million fixed retail connections
7 million fixed broadband accesses
TIM BRASIL

67.3 million mobile lines
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Telecom and digital policies; internal market policies; telecom regulatory framework; implementing provisions of the telecom regulatory framework; trade policies;
Digital single market.
